main.aboutusdesc: Ububiko rusange nububiko bwububiko rusange bwamashami yububiko bwisi yose bukora ibicuruzwa bidasanzwe byamamaye azwi.
main.subscribedesc: Nyamuneka andika imeri yawe niba ushaka kwakira amakuru agezweho muri twe.

section1.sDesc1: Gusa hano urashobora kubona benshi batanga inyungu, byoroshye kwinjiramo, ibyiza bitanga ibicuruzwa nibindi byiza bitandukanye

item.descItem2: Ntabwo yishyuza amafaranga iyo yakiriye impano.

banner1.bDesc1: Niba wiyandikishije, reba imeri yawe buri gihe kugirango ubone amakuru yanyuma muri twe. Tuzatanga kandi inyemezabuguzi zo guhaha kububiko bwacu kubuntu. Utegereje iki! Tangira

section2.sDesc2: Hitamo impano ukunda, urashobora kandi kwitabira gutanga byose uhereye kurutonde dutanga hepfo.

banner2.bDesc2: Gusa nukwiyandikisha wenyine ushobora kwitabira gutanga. Utegereje iki! reka Iyandikishe wowe ubwawe.

section3.sDesc3: Kubona Gutanga kubuntu mumasaha atarenze 24! Ntucikwe naya mahirwe adasanzwe, biroroshye cyane, iyandikishe kurubuga rwacu hanyuma ukore ubushakashatsi (niba bihari), ntacyo ugomba kwishyura. Twishimiye!

step1.ssDesc11: Kugirango ubone amahirwe yo gutsinda %s, icyo ukeneye gukora nukuzuza urupapuro rwabigenewe. Kugirango utangire, andika amarushanwa hamwe na imeri yawe.

step2.ssDesc21: Umaze kwinjira, uzagira amahirwe yo kubona izindi nyandiko wuzuza ibikorwa bitandukanye, harimo no gusura imbuga nkoranyambaga.
step2.ssDesc22: Ufite uburenganzira bwo kurangiza ibikorwa byinshi nkuko ubishaka, buri gikorwa gitanga umubare wihariye wibyanditswe kandi buri cyinjira gishobora gutsinda.
step2.ssDesc23: Urashobora kandi gusimbuka ibikorwa kumadorari 1 gusa.

step3.ssDesc31: Byakozwe. Tuzahita tuvugana dushingiye kuri contact zujujwe mugihe cyo kwiyandikisha kurubuga rwacu.

banner3.bDesc3: Ibi birori bitanga amanota menshi kurusha umwaka ushize. Saba inshuti zawe n'umuryango wawe amahirwe menshi. Iyandikishe nonaha mbere yuko iki gikorwa gitangira.

theWinner.coment1: Urakoze kuri Cash, nizere ko ububiko bwawe buzaba bwuzuye.
theWinner.coment2: Nukuri ni iduka rizwi cyane rya GeneralStore, paki yagenze neza nakiriye, Igicuruzwa numwimerere, kandi ntabwo nishyuye. Murakoze.
theWinner.coment3: Ubwa mbere ntabwo nabyizeraga, ariko nyuma yo kubaganiriza byagaragaye ko ari GeneralStore. urakoze GeneralStore kuri %s.
theWinner.coment4: Imana ishimwe ko yongereye amahirwe, urakoze gutanga, GeneralStore ndabikunda.

section5.sDesc5: Turashimira inkunga yuzuye idufasha buri gihe
section5.dSupport1: Isosiyete ikora ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga muri Amerika ifite icyicaro i Seattle, i Washington, yibanda kuri e-ubucuruzi, kubara ibicu, gukwirakwiza amakuru, hamwe n’ubwenge bw’ubukorikori.
section5.dSupport2: Umucuruzi wa interineti wabanyamerika ugurisha cyane cyane ibikoresho bikuru bifite icyicaro i Midvale, Utah, hafi yumujyi wa Salt Lake City. Patrick M. Byrne yashinze Overstock.com mu 1999.
section5.dSupport3: Isosiyete y'Abanyamerika icuruza ibihugu byinshi ikora urunigi rwa hypermarket, amaduka agabanijwe, hamwe n'amaduka y'ibiribwa aturuka muri Amerika, afite icyicaro i Bentonville, muri Arkansas.
section5.dSupport4: Abacuruzi bo muri Amerika mu mahanga bagurisha ibikoresho bya elegitoroniki bafite icyicaro i Richfield, muri Leta ya Minnesota. Yashinzwe bwa mbere na Richard M. Schulze na James Wheeler mu 1966 nkububiko bwihariye bwamajwi bwitwa Ijwi ryumuziki.
section5.dSupport5: Serivise yo kugurisha kumurongo ikorera mubushinwa ifitwe nitsinda rya Alibaba. Yatangijwe mu mwaka wa 2010, igizwe n’ubucuruzi buciriritse mu Bushinwa n’ahandi, nka Singapore, butanga ibicuruzwa ku baguzi mpuzamahanga kuri interineti.
section5.dSupport6: Isosiyete ikora ibijyanye n’ubucuruzi bw’ibihugu by’Abanyamerika ifite icyicaro i San Jose, muri Kaliforuniya, yorohereza abaguzi-ku-baguzi n’ubucuruzi-ku baguzi binyuze ku rubuga rwayo.

section6.sDesc6: Niba ufite ikibazo kijyanye nigicuruzwa, cyangwa amakuru yose ukeneye, nyamuneka ntutindiganye kutwandikira.
section6.subject: Ingingo
